name: lrnrn-foundation
description:
JUSTIFICATIONS:
- @google/genai: Core engine for Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking integration.
- zustand: Lightweight state for the multi-step Question Flow to prevent prop drilling.
- react-router-dom: HashRouter usage for client-side routing in restricted environments.
- tailwind-merge/clsx: Required for clean, conditional styling of the design system.
- recharts/d3: Visualization for the roadmap dependency nodes and progress analytics.
- zod: Schema validation for AI-generated curriculum JSON outputs.
